item.title: The Shanling Q1 Media Player
item.description: Introduction A while ago I was bored with the Mechanical Keyboard rabbit hole and started looking into other, equally strange rabbit holes to dive into. At the same time, I hit my iPod Classic’s 160GB limit and I’m not yet ready to hack it up to have bigger storage, but to keep it in working condition for posterity as it may find a better home in the future with some collector who is better at soldering than I.
